title: Connex Telecommunications
author: ''
date: '2022-09-12'
slug: connex_telecommunications
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.3M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Connex Telecommunications. The average
  contract duration was 1.16 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $241.5K. The longest
  contract was 3.24 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.5M.
lookup_name: 'CONNEX TELECOMMUNICATIONS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.3M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '25'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '12%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '30%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.33'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.1M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.16'
s421_mean_contract_value: '241.5K'
s425_max_duration: '3.24'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.5M'
---
